name: Internet Money (BSC)
description: Internet Money (IM) was created to serve as a form of peer to peer "digital cash". The contract is simple: you can buy, sell, send and burn IM. Internet Money has no admin keys, no taxes, no reflections and is deflationary. Cryptocurrency was created to be a decentralized way to interact with money. We aim to take continual steps towards the decentralization of every facet of the Internet Money ecosystem; because we believe this is the way money should be: No centralized entities. No controlling forces. Power in the hands of the people.
